category.description: The category of the custom action. Valid values: `Source`, `Build`, `Deploy`, `Test`, `Invoke`, `Approval`

configurationProperties.description: The configuration properties for the custom action. Max 10 items.

inputArtifactDetails.description: The details of the input artifact for the action.

outputArtifactDetails.description: The details of the output artifact of the action.

owner.description: The creator of the action being called.

providerName.description: The provider of the service used in the custom action

settings.description: The settings for an action type.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to this resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

version.description: The version identifier of the custom action.
